title: As the season ends its really important to report those who are doing the wrong thing
body:
Take the time to report, i know most will want to move into the next game, but this is the best 15 seconds of time youll take on that wasted 25~ min game.


**Report** 

**Abusive players
Racist players
Negative attitude and just not caring / giving up
Account sharing and boosting.**

When you report for account boosting grab thier lolking link. it contains their User ID and cannot hide by name changing.

Be sure to include it in the support ticket or post game comments

So far this month I've received x2 notifications that players have received punishments. **THEY DO WORK!**


Best of luck to everyone climbing, Hope you reach your desired rank :)

Peace


{{sticker:vayne-pose}}
